description: Radiometrically corrected Level 1B data (i.e. unprojected TOA reflectance), given per strip/camera. Pixel digital numbers are converted to radiance values. Image remains in raw sensor geometry (unprojected). The spatial resolution varies between 100 and 300 for VNIR and between 200 and 600 for SWIR.
title: PROBA-V L1C: radiometrically corrected raw data, given per strip/camera, HDF format - Collection 2
license: Products can be freely downloaded after registration / Licence: https://proba-v.vgt.vito.be/en/data-policy
